data.name: Multiple Shots at Victory
data.description:
What are your chances of getting at least one "6" if you roll a six-sided die 6 times?

100%? It can't be. You don't always get a 6 when you roll 6 times.

What are you chances of getting into that school you want, knowing their admission rate is x% and you have 'y' shots.

Write a function for this. baseChance should take a number 1-100 or 0.01 to 1.00 and output a String percentage of your chances of 'winning' given numShots. Round the result to 2 decimal places.

ex. 50% win chance for 5 tries => 96.88% chance of winning total.

Helpful Wikipedia link: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Inclusion%E2%80%93exclusion_principle
